thread.title: WATCH: This ad featuring 'The Great Khali' will leave you in splits!
thread.title_full: WATCH: This ad featuring 'The Great Khali' will leave you in splits! - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: WATCH: This ad featuring 'The Great Khali' will leave you in splits!
text:
You must have seen The Great Khali's brutal side in the ring when he used to finish his opponents with 'Khali Chop' or suck the life out of them with his 'Vise Grip'. However, this inhuman strength that made him an overnight WWE superstar, poses an altogether different challenge in his daily life.
And he chose to do a commercial for a cement company to describe the 'ordeal'!
Watch this hilarious video in which Khali can be seen unwittingly smashing walls and falling through roofs!
